hotels.title: Japan Coastal Escape on Awaji Island with Outdoor Pool & Onsen Spa
hotels.description: Embrace complete tranquillity in this coastal sanctuary nestled along the shores of Awaji Island. Overlooking the Naruto Strait whirlpools and surrounded by verdant greenery, this resort blends modern comforts with the island’s rich natural beauty, offering the perfect taste of Japanese culture and scenery. Take relaxation to new heights at the rejuvenating onsen or the outdoor public baths, followed by a sumptuous meal at Le Sensoriel restaurant. Make memories with the little ones at the sprawling outdoor pool, or venture further afield to uncover the island's ancient shrines, striking landscapes and historic landmarks.
